text: Władysław Beszterda (born 28 September 1951) is a Polish rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Poland Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Gdańsk
title: Władysław Beszterda
